welcome: Welcome! An app for finding matches and friends.
privacy_policy: Your data is safe, we do not share it with anyone. Information is stored on our servers.
age_too_young: Sorry, but your age is too young. You might want to play with Barbie instead.
profile_not_found: Your profile was not found. Would you like to create it?
no_profiles: No profiles available for you, please try again later
complaint_to_admin: Thank you. The administrator will review this profile.
complaint_failed: Error. This action is only available while viewing profiles.
error_not_premium: Sorry, but you can only message without match using the Premium package. Click /premium to purchase it.
premium_message: You can message without match only once a day. Are you sure this is the case?
like_limit_reached: You have reached the like limit. Go to the page to get more likes:
premium_likes: You have reached the like limit. You can get more likes with the Premium package. Go to the page to get more likes:
new_message: You have a new message from
shure_delete_profile: Are you sure you want to delete your profile? You won't be able to undo this action.
last_message_delete_user: Sorry to see you leave. We hope you've achieved your goal, so we're no longer needed. But if anything - we are always here.
error_delete_profile: Error deleting profile, please try again
extra_likes_unavailable: You have already used extra likes or cannot activate them.
conversation_not_started: Unable to start a conversation with this user. The conversation might have been interrupted earlier or the match is unavailable.
chat_partner_not_found: Error: Chat partner not found. The conversation has already been ended.
no_active_conversation: You don't have an active conversation to end.
feature_used_today: You have already used this feature today.
